## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                | Type                                     | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `position` | `position` | (optional) The tooltip's position relative to its content. | `"bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"` | `'top'`     |
| `text`     | `text`     | The tooltip's text.                                        | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
